title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE'S NOTE
description: She's left you a note on her table

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje's Note: ""I'm sorry I fucked everyone over...."
dialogueTree.text:
"I'm sorry I fucked everyone over.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not drawing my gun... yet. Bu..."
links.text: "I am not drawing my gun... yet. But I don't like 'gifts'."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He says he's not, but his hand move..."
links.text: He says he's not, but his hand moves instinctively toward his holster as he studies the note.

links.title: Half Light: "Just don't walk into another radio..."
links.text: Just don't walk into another radio trap, okay...

links.title: Volition: "Relax. Not everyone is out to trap..."
links.text: Relax. Not everyone is out to trap you.

links.title: Cuno: ""A trap, probably." He nods confide..."
links.text: "A trap, probably." He nods confidently. "But don't sweat it. You got the Cuno spotting you. Let's go in."

links.title: Klaasje's Note: "No response, not even an echo in th..."
links.text: No response, not even an echo in the stuffy room. You notice a silk shirt on the stairs.

links.title: You: "Seems she left in a hurry."
links.text: Seems she left in a hurry.

links.title: Interfacing: "You look at her rough, jagged handw..."
links.text: You look at her rough, jagged handwriting on the note. She was in a rush, but not panicked. Deliberate. Focused.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah-yeah." He looks around. "Fugi..."
links.text: "Yeah-yeah." He looks around. "Fugitive on the run shit. Cuno's seen this shit before."

links.title: Klaasje's Note: "The note does not reply. The jagged..."
links.text: The note does not reply. The jagged, rough handwriting looks like she was in a hurry.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje's Note: "Next to stacks of bills, you see a..."
dialogueTree.text: Next to stacks of bills, you see a note -- a few lines jotted down in large, uneven handwriting just as the writer was about to rush out the door.

links.title: Klaasje's Note: ""See you at The Return. PS. I di..."
links.text:
"See you at The Return.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A gift..." The lieutenant turns to..."
links.text: "A gift..." The lieutenant turns to the staircase suspiciously, looking for any signs of another presence in the shadows above.

links.title: Cuno: ""A gift, huh... ?" The kid turns to..."
links.text: "A gift, huh... ?" The kid turns to the staircase. "That's fucking suspicious to Cuno."

links.title: Klaasje's Note: ""I'm sorry I fucked everyone over...."
links.text:
"I'm sorry I fucked everyone over.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."
